content: I'm having some issues with fin nipping in my community tank, specifically the platies going after the neon tetras. I've tried rearranging the decorations, but it's still a problem. Do you have any suggestions on how to stop this behavior? By the way, I also fed my fish frozen brine shrimp for the first time on February 1st, and they loved it! I also cleaned the gravel and decorations that day.
